name: ASHGARD: Tone Break
description:
After the devastating RAGNARÖK, Midgard got almost completely destroyed, and all that’s left are shattered floating islands. To help Midgard regenerate, the Norse god Bragi planted wondrous and magical music-playing trees. With their power, the world of Midgard could be made habitable again. However, those melody trees got corrupted by the darkness and fell silent. Help Midgard and play as the Norse goddess Idunn to awaken the melody trees with the help of a unique and magical musical instrument.




Master new songs on your way through the destroyed world of Midgard and use them as abilities to overcome every obstacle, puzzle, and darkness between you and your journey to reawaken the mysterious melody tress.



Discover the perished civilizations of Midgard and what's left of them, uncover their hidden secrets, and solve puzzles by using their old and abandoned technologies and devices to your advantage.


  • Single Player Music Adventure
  • Play songs on your musical instrument “Himinnhorn” to use powerful abilities
  • Discover multiple large islands with different biomes, challenges, and secrets
  • Use your musical instrument to solve various creative music puzzles
  • Discover more about the world of ASHGARD and its mysteries from the past and future



Join our journey and prepare yourself for the best to come:
  • Customizable musical instrument
  • Boss monsters
  • Subtitles for other languages
and of course: Complete new islands, songs (abilities), puzzles, secrets and more!
